Name: Cho'Gath
AbilityDescription:
Passive: Cho'Gath has increased Magic Resist.

Spell: Cho'Gath breathes a cosmic beam in a forward arc that deals magic damage and increasing their maximum Mana until they cast.

Magic Resist Bonus : 75 / 100 / 150

Magic Resist Ratio : 135% / 180% 225%

Mana Cost Increase : 35% / 35% / 50%

Bonus Damage : 80 / 120 / 180
